evidence.claim: Elite Care adheres to HIPAA regulations for managing patient data securely.
They utilize FHIR standards to facilitate data exchange in healthcare applications.
The company emphasizes security related to health information management in its careers section.
No specific EDI or X12 transaction sets were found on their website, indicating limited direct mentioning of these standards.
No information found on cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP, indicating a lack of openness about their technical infrastructure.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of reliance on X12 transactions or API automation in their operations.
